SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.photo_url AS photoUrl, u.enable, u.create_time AS createTime, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, r.id AS roleId, r.name AS roleName FROM t_user AS u INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE 1=1
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
